summary: A tenacious daughter and an expert boatman are more than eager to prolong their parents' irreconcilable feud; however, an untimely demise will only make things worse. Can a humble priest help them bury the hatchet--and, maybe--find love?
cast: Aliki Vougiouklaki|Dimitris Papamichael|Pantelis Zervos|Thodoros Moridis|Yorgos Damasiotis|Despo Diamantidou|Smaro Stefanidou|Kaiti Lambropoulou|Lavrentis Dianellos|Thanasis Vengos|Spyros Kalogirou|Maria Giannakopoulou|Thanasis Tzeneralis|Mary Metaxa|Panos Karavousanos|Nikos Flokas|Elena Apergi|Vasilis Kailas|Georgia|Periklis Hristoforidis|Hryso|Kornelio|Paraskevo|Pothito
title: Madalena
